Package net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.content.querybuilder

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DeletionBuilder
    Builds a deletion query against a given ContentResolver and Uri.
    DeletionBuilderTest
    Exercises DeletionBuilder.
    InsertionBuilder
    Builds an insertion query against a given ContentResolver and Uri.
    InsertionBuilderTest
    Exercises InsertionBuilder.
    MockContentProvider
    Used to exercise QueryBuilder and its implementation classes.
    MockQueryBuilder
    Used exclusively by QueryBuilderExceptionsTest.
    MockQueryBuilder.Broken
    An intentionally-broken version of MockQueryBuilder.
    QueryBuilder<I extends QueryBuilder,R>
    Builds a ContentResolver query using builder-style methods, rather than the standard methods, which use long lists of often-null parameters.
    QueryBuilderExceptionsTest
    Exercises the exceptions defined as inner classes in QueryBuilder.
    QueryBuilderTest
    Exercises QueryBuilder.
    QueryBuilderTest.MockContext
    Open structure providing an operational context for the classes that test QueryBuilder and its implementation classes.
    SelectionBuilder
    Builds an insertion query against a given ContentResolver and Uri.
    SelectionBuilderTest
    Exercises SelectionBuilder.
    UpdateBuilder
    Builds an insertion query against a given ContentResolver and Uri.
    UpdateBuilderTest
    Exercises UpdateBuilder.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    QueryBuilder.ExecutionException
    Exception thrown by QueryBuilder.execute() and QueryBuilder.executeOn(android.content.ContentResolver, android.net.Uri) when the underlying ContentResolver query operation fails.
    QueryBuilder.UnboundException
    Informs a consumer of QueryBuilder that it has tried to invoke the QueryBuilder.execute() method without first binding to a data source.
